name: Eket City Park
description: A spacious urban park featuring playgrounds, walking trails, and picnic areas for the whole family.

name: Eket Museum
description: Explore the rich heritage of the area with exhibits from the pioneer era to modern times.

name: Urua Nka Market
description: A bustling weekend market with local vendors, crafts, and fresh produce.

name: Eket city Lake
description: Enjoy kayaking, paddleboarding, and stunning lake views at this popular outdoor spot.

name: Sunset Theater
description: A renovated classic theater showing indie films, live performances, and local productions.

name: Botanical Gardens
description: Wander through beautifully curated gardens featuring regional plants and seasonal blooms.

name: Eket Tech Innovation Hub
description: A collaborative space for startups and tech companies driving innovation in the region.

name: Eket Sports Center
description: Enjoy in the best recreational center in the area.
